query: Q1. When you create a new, blank presentation, you begin with one blank slide. What is the layout name of this slide?
options:
Blank
 Title slide
 Title and Content
 Title Onty

query: Q2. What do you use to align objects on a slide to one another?
options:
Layout tools
 Arrange tools
 Design Ideas feature
 Picture tools

`In MS PP 2019 it's called "Drawing Tools". There is no such answer but there is a function called "Arrange"`

query: Q3. Which option must be enabled if you want to manipulate the playback of a video file during a presentation?
options:
Record Side Show
 Use Presenter View
 Show Playback Controls
 Show Media Controls

query: Q4. Which feature analyzes the content of your slides and offers suggested options?
options:
Design ideas
 Smartart
 Browse for Themes
 Add-Ins

query: Q5. Where can you configure advanced PDF options?
options:
the Options tab
 the Home tab
 the Print dialog box
 the Share tab

`Should be in the printer window not in the options menu`

query: Q6. Which tab is best for adding various types of objects to slides?
options:
Animations
 view
 File
 Insert

query: Q7. Which SmartArt category can you use to make informational graphics out of bullet points?
options:
all of these answers
 Pyramid
 List
 Matrix

query: Q8. What is NOT checked when you run the Accessibility Checker?
options:
reading order
 slide titles
 missing alt text
 grammar
      [Source](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/rules-for-the-accessibility-checker-651e08f2-0fc3-4e10-aaca-74b4a67101c1?ns=powerpnt&version=16&ui=en-us&rs=en-us&ad=us)

query: Q9. How can you change the appearance of a table in one click?
options:
Apply a cell stye.
 Apply a graphic style.
 Apply a table style.
 Right-click a table and choose a new style.

`Table Tools -> Design Tab -> Table Styles`

query: Q10. Which option changes a text box so that it automatically changes shape to fit longer text?
options:
Resize shape to fit text
 Do not autofit
 none of these answers
 Shrink text on overflow

query: Q11. Which three shadow properties can be adjusted in PowerPoint?
code:
A. Focal Point
B. Depth
C. Blur
D. Angle
E. Distance
options:
A, B, C
 A, C, E
 B, C, D
 C, D, E

query: Q12. You want your presentation to play continuously on screen, What option must you set?
options:
Use Presenter view
 Advance slides manually
 Advance slides automatically
 Loop continuously until 'Esc'

`Slide Show Tab -> Set Up Slide Show -> Show options -> Loop continuously until 'Esc'`

query: Q13. Which statement about the Compress Pictures command is true?
options:
You can compress all images at the same time.
 You cannot delete cropped areas.
 There are no options for print output.
 You can compress only one image at a time.

query: Q15. In what manner can you filter comments?
options:
by length
 by author
 by date
 by urgency

query: Q16. Which Arrow Options choice will hide the mouse cursor when presenting, except when the cursor is moved?
options:
Automatic
 Hidden
 none of these answers
 Visible

`If hidden is selected the courser stays hidden no matter what.`

query: Q17. Which chart type is best suited for displaying annual financial data for a 10-year period?
options:
donut chart
 line or area chart
 area chart
 pie chart

query: Q18. If you want to create an organizational chart, which SmartArt category works best?
options:
Pyramid
 Relationship
 Hierarchy
 Matrix

query: Q19. When printing multiple handouts, which option will group multipage documents together and make them easier to distribute?
options:
Print on Both Sides
 Uncollated
 Print One-sided
 Collated

query: Q20. How can you adjust which data in a table is used when working on a chart?
options:
Click the Switch Row/Column button.
 Click the Refresh Data button.
 Click the Select Data button.
 Click the Edit Data button.

query: Q21. Which view lets you see additional information on a second monitor when delivering a presentation?
options:
Normal view
 Reading view
 Slide Sorter view
 Presenter view

query: Q22. A picture looks good in your slide show but pixelated when you print it. How can you fix this?
options:
Compress the picture and use the Print (220 ppi) resolution setting.
 Select Best scale for slide show, increase the picture resolution and resize the picture to the original size
 Remove picture compression.
 Change the printer property settings to print in a higher resolution.

`Personal Hint: File Tab -> Options -> Advanced -> Image Size and Quality -> Do not compress images in file File Tab -> Options -> Advanced -> Print -> High quality `

query: Q23. You have inserted a video on a slide and want the video to automatically start 2 seconds after the associated slide appears. How can you accomplish this?
options:
Use playback timings.
 Use animation timings.
 Use animation triggers.
 Use video timings.

query: Q24. When inserting pictures, how can you avoid distorting the pictureif it is resized later?
options:
Use best scale for slide show.
 Lock the aspect ratio.
 Compress the picture.
 Set the picture to be relative to the orignal picture size.

query: Q25. Which Protect Presentation option protects a presentation from accidental changes?
options:
Always Open Read-Only
 Add a Digital Signature
 Encrypt with Password
 Mark as Final

query: Q26. How can you change colors in your presentation all at once without changing the design?
options:
Apply a Color Template.
 Apply a Color Theme.
 Apply a Color Palette.
 Customize the Color Fills.

query: Q27. What function allows you to borrow slides from a presentation fro an other presentation?
options:
Borrow Slides
 There is no special fuction. You must use Copy and Pase
 Reuse Slides
 Find Slides

query: Q28. What is the term used for the arrangement of elements on a slide, such as Title and Content?
options:
theme
 design
 sheme
 layout

query: Q29. How would you change a list of text to a visual diagram on a slide?
options:
Convert to WordArt.
 Convert to Shapes.
 Convert to SmartArt.
 Convert to Picture.

query: Q30. You need to reorder the levels of shapes on a SmartArt diagram. How can this be done
options:
Retype the text
 Change the shapes from rifht to left.
 Promote Shapes and/or Demote Shapes.
 Move the shapes up and down.

query: Q31. Why would you trim a video?
options:
To crop the video thumbnail.
 To resize the video.
 To remove background noise in the video.
 To remove some of the beginning and/or end of the video.

query: Q32. How would you save your layouts, colors, fonts, effects, background styles and content for others to use with their presentations?
options:
Export the file as a template.
 Save the file as a PDF.
 Save the file as a POTX.
 Save the file as a PPTX.

`Personal Hint: There are multiple file suffixes for templates (.potx, .potm, .pot).`

query: Q33. You are creating an industrial presentation of a new software program and would like to include an image of your program. How can you use PowerPoint to do this?
options:
Use the Copy command.
 Use the Screenshot command. (Office2019)
 Use the Print key.
 Use the Capture Screen command.

query: Q34. How can you add more layouts to the Layout Gallery?
options:
Customize the Layout Gallery.
 Add Slide Layouts to the Slide Master.
 Use the Add Layouts command.
 Use the Insert Layouts command.

query: Q35. Why would you use the Outline view?
options:
To see only the text in placeholders.
 To present the slides at a high level.
 To add text from a Word document.
 To organize your slides.

query: Q36. The text on the left and right of the slide are cut off in print preview. How can you fix this in the printer settings?
options:
Unselect High Quality.
 Select Scale to Fit Paper.
 Select Frame Slides.
 Select Frame Slides.

query: Q37. In addition to organizing your slides, how else can sections increase your productivity?
options:
In addition to organizing your slides, how else can sections increase your productivity?.
 All the slides in a section can be selected at once to apply changes such as transitions, layouts or hiding slides.
 Sections can be exported as a separate presentation.
 You can resize all the slides in a section at once.

query: Q38. You have many slides that you need to reorder. How would you accomplish this?
options:
Move the slides in Slide Show view.
 Renumber the slides in Outline view.
 Move the slides in the Slide Sorter view.
 Reset the slide footers.

query: Q39. What can be seen in Presenter view?
options:
Timer.
 Notes.
 Side Navigator.
 all of these answers.

query: Q40. How can you format the entire contents of a text box?
options:
Click the dashed/dotted border of the text box.
 Right-click the text box and select Select All.
 Click the Fond button on the Home tab.
 Double-click any word in the text box.

query: Q41. You have a large number of objects on your slide. How can you use the selection pane to help you identify the objects quickly?
options:
Select the show/hide icons next to the objects.
 Rename the objects with meaningful names.
 Drag and drop the objects.
 Tab through the objects and note each object as it's highlighted.

query: Q42. How would you ensure a consistent appearance and placement across your slides even though the content might be different?
options:
Use fonts.
 Use styles.
 Use bullet points.
 Use layouts.

query: Q44. You are having trouble playing back a presentation smoothly. What should you do?
options:
Copy the presentation to your internal hard drive.
 Clear the **Disable hardware graphics acceleration** option.
 all of these answers
 Select the **Show without animation** option.

query: Q45. Which feature lets you configure multiple combinations of specific slides for playback from a larger slideshow?
options:
Record Slide Show
 Rehearse Timings
 Custom Slide Show
 Hide Slide

query: Q46. When working with a mapchart, which options can be drawn?
options:
Postal code
 State
 Country
 All of these answers

query: Q47. You receive feedback from two clients on your presentation. Each person sent you an edited file. What's the best way to review their changes?
options:
Review > Accept
 Review > Smart Lookup
 Review > Compare
 Review > Show Comments

query: Q48. How do you promote subbullets to top-level bullets?
options:
Press Shift+Tab.
 Right-click the bulleted text and select Promote.
 Press the Esc key.
 Press the Spacebar.

query: Q49. What is the term used for the arrangement of elements on a slide, such as Title and Content?
options:
scheme
 layout
 theme
 design

query: Q50. After you select the chart icon in a placeholder, what is the next step to create a chart?
options:
Select the chart elements.
 Select the chart type.
 Select the chart data in Excel.
 Select the chart style.

query: Q51. How would you show a correlation between the amount of chocolate a city consumes and the number of crimes committed?
options:
Use a bar chart.
 Use a column chart.
 Use a line chart.
 Use a scatter chart.

query: Q52. You want to use a morph transition between two slides. How do you set up the slides?
options:
The two slides must have multiple objects in common with different names in the Selection pane
 The two slides must have at least one obiect in common that is in a different position on the second slide
 The second slide must have different objects that are in the same position as the objects on the first slide
 The two slides must have at least one obiect in common that is in the same position on the second slide

query: Q53. Why would you use the Rehearse Timings command?
options:
to adiust animation timings
 to record your slide show
 to remove transition timings
 to determine how long it takes to present your slide show

query: Q54. How can you make an inserted picture look like it has been sketched or painted?
options:
Apply a picture effect
 Apply a draw effect
 Apply an artistic effect
 Apply a picture style

query: Q55. How can you modify your presentations entire set of colors with a single change?
options:
Apply a color template
 Customize a color fill
 Apply a color palette
 Apply a color theme

query: Q56. You want to print full-page slides to fill 8. 5-by-11-inch paper, but they appear too small in the preview. What is the best way to rectify this?
options:
Change the slide size to standard
 Repeatedly bump up the scale setting print option until it fills the page in the preview
 Change the scale setting print option to 100%
 Select the **Scale to Fit Paper** print option

query: Q57. You want to import a Word document as an outline into a Powerpoint presentation. How should you format the Word documents text that you want to be the slide content?
options:
List 2
 Content Style
 Subtitle
 Heading Style 2

query: Q58. What is not reviewed when you check a slide shows accessibility?
options:
missing alt text
 slide titles
 grammar
 reading order

query: Q59. What is the easiest way to change the appearance of a table?
options:
Apply a graphic style
 Apply a table style
 Right-click a table and select a new style
 Apply a cell style
